subcategory.name: Description Lists
subcategory.description: Description lists examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS description list components to present detailed information in a structured and readable format. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
